thread.title: Years of experience in the stagecoach driver’s seat
thread.title_full: Years of experience in the stagecoach driver’s seat - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill K. Robinson
title: Years of experience in the stagecoach driver’s seat
text: When the big red stagecoach thunders down Columbia’s Main Street, take a look before it passes and notice who’s driving. The gentleman clad in Western hat, duster coat and boots may be Tom Fraser. It’s rare to find longevity in the workplace, but Fraser has more than 40 years driving stagecoaches and carriages — a career that started right here, with the Columbia stage line.
